snippet.title: Fling To The Finish Reveal Trailer - Future Games Show Spring Showcase
snippet.description:
Fling to the Finish is a cooperative racing game where teammates are tethered together by a stretchy elastic rope. Get up close and personal with your partner as you share a controller to manoeuvre two characters bouncing, rolling, and flinging their way to the finish line!

Here is some exclusive gameplay from the gaming group Stumpt getting to grips with the fun coop mechanics. Play the game first via early access and the full game in the second half of 2021. 

To check out the full video by Stumpt go to - https://www.youtube.com/user/stumptgamers

#FlingToTheFinish
